author: Hive Bot
subject: fix(guardian)[agent:golden]: Fix critical CLI bugs for Guardian Agent
body:
Phase 1: Critical Bug Fixes
- Fixed trailing comma syntax error in cli_review.py:129 (created tuple instead of engine)
- Fixed method mismatch: CLI now uses analyze_pr_for_comments() instead of non-existent generate_pr_comments()
- Converted CLI to async/await pattern to match RAGCommentEngine API
- Fixed rag_comment_engine.py syntax errors (trailing commas on lines 210, 359)
- Added test file with Golden Rule violations for validation
